title: Your Kitch
desc: This is a cloud Kitchen website. Where users can list their meals and customers can review them.

title: QuizBudd
desc: This is a quiz taking website. Here you can give test in html, css, js etc. You can check the answers in real time.

title: Book House
desc: This is a buying/selling website. Here anyone one can add their used book and buyers can buy them. Admin can manage all the buyers and sellers.
